fields.name: ContinueOnErrors
fields.description: Flag that indicates whether to continue if one of the command fails.

fields.name: ForceUpdateTag
fields.description: A unique string. If changed the script will be applied again.

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: The provisioned state of the resource.

fields.name: ScriptContent
fields.description: The script content. This property should be used when the script is provide inline and not through file in a SA. Must not be used together with scriptUrl and scriptUrlSasToken properties.

fields.name: ScriptUrl
fields.description: The url to the KQL script blob file. Must not be used together with scriptContent property

fields.name: ScriptUrlSasToken
fields.description: The SaS token that provide read access to the file which contain the script. Must be provided when using scriptUrl property.
